ModuleDescription: The objective of this module is to provide an introduction to the fundamental topics and concepts in chemistry. This includes topics such as structure of matter, periodic table and periodicity, chemical bonding, states of matter, stoichiometry, reaction types, kinetics, equilibrium and introduction to organic chemistry.
Prerequisite: ’O’ level pass in chemistry or equivalent
Preclusion:
Students with ‘A’ level or H2 Chemistry or equivalent.
